text: Matthew Zimmerman (26 December 1934 â€“ 9 June 2022) was a Canadian actor. He was best known as the voice of Alan Tracy in the 1960s television series Thunderbirds and sequel movies Thunderbirds Are Go and Thunderbird 6. Zimmerman died on 8 June 2022, at the age of 87.RIP Matt Zimmerman ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Actors from Ontario Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:People from Greater Sudbury
